author: mrodozov
body:
#### PR description:

Fixes: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31236 
After moving the vsize to 1500, the test failed because the RSS was not enough 
So I moved them both to be 1.5 of their value if the arch is Arm

#### PR validation:

The test runs now on Arm
title: Fix Arm unit test in FWCore/Services
